storyInfo: Amiya defeats the ancient Damazti Cluster. The Lord of the Banshees' bone whistle rings throughout the Royal Court, celebrating the Damazti Cluster's rebirth into a new form.

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: At your King of Sarkaz, Banshee.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You're facing Amiya.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I advise you to carefully consider your actions.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: And you should do away with the curses in your hands.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Relax. They've already won.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: I'm grateful for our earlier exchanges, Damazti. I have a clearer understanding of your methods now.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz couldn't have possibly lost to our clone that had already been fried near to a crisp by a Draco's flames.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But we are glad to have experienced something new for the first time in such a long time.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: It's been ages since we've seen anything that has brought us even a speck of excitement.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Be proud of yourself, Banshee. You've convinced us, and we'll be more than happy to keep this new possibility of yours, though we're still not very optimistic about the direction this possibility is heading.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But to us, time and patience are two things we have more than plenty of.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We will meet again, at the next finish line.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Where are you going next?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We've never gone anywhere on purpose, we merely wander the land.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You've mentioned before, Damazti, that you've pretty much exhausted all possibilities.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But there remains uncharted territory for you.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Everything on this great land is constantly evolving, while you stayed just as you always have been, imitating the fruits of evolution.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Yes, you've never gone anywhere, and yet you're already complete.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: So of course there can be no progress in something that's already been completed.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How persuasively provocative. And what do you suggest?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You've already guessed it.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Heralding our deaths—you do live up to your name, bean sí.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: From death comes new life.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Indeed, we've never tried this before...
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We just bid goodbye to a friend, at a place not far from here.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: She said that she would rather give up living than to let life wash over her.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We felt her emotions, we saw her determination.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: She claimed it was the choice of a coward, but we felt something else.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We could barely put it in words then, but now we know, that it also took a certain kind of courage.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: The kind of courage we've never considered before.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Well, alright. Banshee, we admit it
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We've begun looking forward to this.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: This might be just an innocuous scheme of yours, a clumsy method of ridding yourself of an enemy.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But that doesn't matter to us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Or maybe the souls are merely borrowing your voice to provoke us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Need me to help you?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How about you leave us with some decency?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Though you ought to sound the death knell for us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You sure are a tenacious and brave bunch. Celebrate your victory.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.options: This can't be your full power.

attributes.content: What, are you not entertained, Doctor of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Or maybe that's unnecessary? Maybe we actually understand you on a... level beyond your worst estimates?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.options: I trust Rhodes Island's security systems.;......;Do you also have a clone on Rhodes Island?

attributes.content: Haha, relax, Doctor. Your ship's onboarding inspection is not as easy as it seems to slip through.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Alright. Goodbye, all.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: What else can we do with our broken body?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We've stayed in our original form for... long enough.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Tiny King of Sarkaz, where will you go next?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Where will you bring these people who trust you, follow you, protect you?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Will you do as Buldrokkas'tee prophesized, and enslave everything across all the lands...?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Or will you prove that it is only us who have been bound too deeply by the chains of history?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: 'Evolution,' a tricky word indeed, implying an inevitable progress, though it may not be.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But no matter, you will find your path, and us as well.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: He dissipated...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, the Damazti won't die. His other, more complete and stronger self, is probably just around the corner.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: This is a typical tactic of his, to have the prey let down its guard, and then come in for the kill...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: A bone whistle? How can this be?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Logos sees the bone whistle as a lamentable tradition of the Royal Court, and has always refused to sound it as his predecessors have done.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: But this is indeed a bone whistle from the Master of Knells.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Damazti cluster... is dying.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.text: 'The elegy has sounded, the bone whistle done wailing.'
'I serve as a witness to a Sarkaz, the Damazti, and his cluster.'

attributes.content: A bone whistle.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: How long has it been since we've had the Lord of the Banshees grace our court to sound the bone whistle?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The Damazti Cluster has died.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Fret not, the Damazti has only encountered a minor setback, he'll soon...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: No, what I mean is, every Damazti fragment is simultaneously decaying.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Damazti dies, and our long-lasting Royal Court will collapse.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Hmph, how interesting.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I think, that he himself never imagined that it would end like this.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: How should I describe it? A split into halves?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Or the birth of two new lives?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The ancient Damazti no longer exists.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And two newborn Damazti have appeared in this world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sand in nature is regarded as the final state of all things. No matter how strong a boulder may be, it turns to dust at the end of time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But then again, the sand may also hold the possibility of starting a cycle of reincarnation anew.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, your wounds are still healing, move another inch and I'll tell Shining—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm already fine, for the most part.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: An old friend might locate us soon... no, I should say a new friend now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want to meet any of your old or new friends.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There's good news and bad news, pick one?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, I sure am tired. Why did I think you would be up for a stupid game?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The bad news is—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Give me the good news.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The bad news is that we didn't find the entrance to the Sarkaz supply route in Brentwood. There was no underground tunnel at all, but there was a passage used for inspections...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, you... huh?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I said, give me the good news.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... um, I...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Shining—!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I like to hear positive news sometimes as well, Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The good news is, we managed to get in touch with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Thank you for your assistance, Duke Windermere. We've managed to re-establish our communication channels.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The refugees we brought have all boarded the ship, and they'll be under the Duke of Windermere's protection for the time being.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I should be the one thanking you, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: You've helped the townspeople of Norport Borough escape a disaster. Not all of them, but... it's enough.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Protecting the people is what we, those who bear the title of duke, ought to do.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: And, you even saved my daughter.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: She was just bawling in her room earlier.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Mum! I was only...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I can guess what you've all been through the last couple of days.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: But Delphine, perhaps you have come to better understand how those in power should wield authority.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: If I may be so bold, Your Grace, how are you planning to use your power?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: After witnessing the fate of the Steam Knights, I'm not sure—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I had to make a strategic decision, daughter of Montague.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: You may call it a plot, and I won't deny that I signed my name on the Steam Knights' orders.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: But... to decide the future of this country is exactly our duty.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: ...'Duty'.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes, Miss Vina. 'Duty'.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: You understand why I'm addressing you that way.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If you'd excuse us, Your Grace. For now, I would... rather be with my friends.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: As you please.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Now then, Doctor of Rhodes Island. I believe... we can't avoid discussing the object your operator is carrying.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: I knew it wasn't my imagination.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: That is Victoria's Realmblade, yes?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Delphine was praising you so highly that perhaps I require a re-evaluation.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Anyway, it's impossible to ignore her and the sword she's carrying.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Delphine told me about your deal with her. Even though there were some twists and turns in between, I'm sure that deal remains valid.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.options: Don't tell me you're becoming a supporter of Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: But I promise you that for now, I'll act as if nothing happened.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: We can talk this out slowly when we've returned to my demesne.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Cador didn't get on the ship, he left with a bunch of people.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: And Hannah?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: She's still in her room and refuses to come out.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Let's get her something to eat. She's barely had a decent meal in Norport.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What are you burning?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A bunch of drafts.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Notes I saved for writing inspiration.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But I forgot where I dropped my memoir notebook, haha.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Siege, you don't need it, do you? We don't need it anymore.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege, what's... are you crying?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: No, I just...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Heavy tears roll down Siege's cheeks, while Morgan and Dagda are both stunned in their common consensus—Vina has never shed a tear before.
On the deck of this high-speed battleship, the Victorian sun is still slowly rising, sweeping the haze and evaporating the mist from last night.
And this youth called Vina, with her back to the sun, is expressing her emotions without a word.
I just... got ash in my eyes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Norport will return to her old self, the people are still there after all.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We'll get our old lives back... eventually.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We just... need patience. A little more of it.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Vina, I—
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The war is going to end, right?
attributes.name: Morgan
